task_background: Prepare the Disneyland Park Operations Control Center for the daily operations and ensure all equipment is functional and properly placed.

tasks.task_description: Place the ergonomic chair (ergonomic_chair_1) on the floor next to the U-shaped workstation (u_shaped_workstation_1).
Turn on the dual monitor setup (dual_monitor_1).
Find the black radio headset (headset_1) and disconnect it.
Find the heaviest furniture in the main dispatch hub (led_display_wall_1) and turn it on.
Format the diagnostic tablet (diagnostic_tablet_1) using the tablet's built-in tools.
Use the torque wrench (torque_wrench_1) to loosen the screws on the emergency override console (emergency_override_console_1) and open it.
Find the blue CM keycard (keycard_1) and use it to open the locker (locker_1) in the break room.
Have robot_1 and robot_2 cooperate to open the heavy-duty workbench (heavy_duty_workbench_1).
Have robot_1 and robot_2 cooperate to turn on the FastPass terminal (fastpass_terminal_1).
Move the sealed parts crate (parts_crate_1) to the FastPass desk.
Move the heavy-duty workbench (heavy_duty_workbench_1) to the inventory supply room.
Cooperatively move the printer (printer_1) that is turned off to the technical support bay and turn it on.
Cooperatively move the touchscreen map table (touchscreen_map_table_1) to the break room and turn it on.
